name: Build'em Up
description:
Build'Em Up was made in 48 hours, for Magalu Game Jam!

Follow the missadventures of Nelson, a construction worker that everyday has to defeat hordes of aliens that dare to invade his neighborhood.

Some, such as Grandma Jurema, don't aprecciate Nelson good will, seeing only the loud side of his job, but that doesn't matter to Nelson, who is doing it only for the common good.

HOW TO PLAY

KEYBOARD

J - Pick up item / weapon 

K - Basic attack

L - Charged attack / Weapon throw

I - Weapon Upgrade

WASD - Movement

CONTROLLER

X - Basic attack

Y - Charged attack / Weapon throw

B - Pick up item / weapon

RB - Weapon Upgrade

Left Analog Stick - Movement

FEATURES

Goofy Aliens to explode

Crafting powerfull weapons

Help  ̷di̷s̷t̷u̷r̷b̷i̷n̷g̷  maintaining peace

A safer neighborhood for everyone

CREDITS

Gabriel Lo Monaco - Programmer

Gustavo Mondini - Sound Designer, Composer

Juliano Sarti - Character Designer

Leonardo Raymundo - Sound Designer

Rafael Farinha - Animator, VFX Artist

Thierry Arnone - Producer, Sound Designer
